title: Toppo
skills_text:
When this card attacks, draw 1 card.
When your life is at 4 or less or you have a yellow Unison Card with a specified cost of 2 in play : You may choose up to 2 of your energy, switch them to Active Mode, then choose cards in your life and add them to your hand until you have 6 life left, and flip this card over.
skills_back_text:
When this card attacks, draw 1 card.
If you have a yellow Unison Card with a specified cost of 2 in play, when a player plays a Battle Card, that player can't play Battle Cards for the turn.

title: Vegeta, Unison of Fury
energy_text: X()
skills_text:
Choose this card or 1 of your Battle Cards and switch it to Rest Mode : Add a marker to this card.
Your opponent can't attack with Battle Cards with energy costs greater than their current energy until the end of their next turn.
Choose up to 1 of your opponent's energy, switch it to Rest Mode, then this card gets +5000 power, , and for the turn.

title: Belmod, the Self-Indulgent
energy_text: 4()
skills_text:
The Battle Card being played is played in Rest Mode, then play this card.
Negate the attack, play this card, then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and negate its skills for the turn.
During your opponent's turn, if you have a yellow Unison Card with a specified cost of 2 in play, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 2.

title: Marcarita, Tutor of Power
energy_text: 3()
skills_text:
If you have a yellow Unison Card with a specified cost of 2 in play, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 1.
When this card attacks, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards in Rest Mode and it can't be switched to Active Mode until the start of your next turn.

title: Dyspo, the Flashstriker
energy_text: 2()
skills_text: If you have a yellow Unison Card with a specified cost of 2 in play and you have no Battle Cards in play : Play this card from your hand.

title: Kahseral, the Slashstriker
skills_text:
When you play this card, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 yellow Unison Card with a specified cost of 2 or up to 1 yellow 《Universe 11》 card with an energy cost of 4 or less among them, add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
When this card is switched to Rest Mode by one of your skills, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 4 or less and switch it to Rest Mode.

title: Spirit Fist
skills_text:
When the Battle Card is played, you may choose it and switch it to Rest Mode.
If your Leader Card is a 《Universe 11》 card and it's your turn : Choose up to 1 of your Leader Cards or up to 1 of your yellow Unison Cards with a specified cost of 2 and it gets +10000 power for the turn.
